text: Reca or RECA can be: * Reca, village and municipality in western Slovakia in Senec District in the Bratislava Region * RecA, protein essential for the repair and maintenance of DNA * Radiation Exposure Compensation Act (RECA) * Damian Reca, an Argentine chess master * Arkadiusz Reca, Polish footballer == See also == * Recaş (disambiguation)
title: Reca (disambiguation)
